name: ArcAngle
description:
How far can you get?

How high can score?

Post VIDEO, or it never happened!

First built this in 2009 and just tweekd it a bit for an actual release, not sure I ever released this game before now.

involves some shooting, and some attraction of the shots to the player,. and other things,. . give it a try.

Uses the in-build sound system of the ZGameEditor, I was going to add SunVox for some ambient sounds, but then I would want to redo all the sounds and this one still has some charm., the timing of the sequenced "music" is unstable as it is tied to the game.

WASD or ARROWS

ZK spawn tron

XL specific gravity generator

SPACE to pause gameplay

G to toggle GUI (text)

ESC quit program
